mapper.select: SELECT CLIENTCODE, CLIENTNAME, SALESNUMBER, MANAGER, TELEPHONE, FAXNUMBER, MANAGEREMAIL, BUSINESS, PLACE, RELATE, BUSINESSTYPE, BANKNAME, ACCOUNTNUMBER, USESTATUS FROM CLIENT

SELECT CLIENTCODE, CLIENTNAME, SALESNUMBER, MANAGER, TELEPHONE, FAXNUMBER, MANAGEREMAIL, BUSINESS, PLACE, RELATE, BUSINESSTYPE, BANKNAME, ACCOUNTNUMBER, USESTATUS FROM CLIENT WHERE CLIENTCODE = #{clientCode}

SELECT CLIENTCODE,Rca CLIENTNAME, SALESNUMBER, MANAGER, TELEPHONE, FAXNUMBER, MANAGEREMAIL, BUSINESS, PLACE, RELATE, BUSINESSTYPE, BANKNAME, ACCOUNTNUMBER, USESTATUS FROM CLIENT WHERE CLIENTNAME LIKE '%' || #{clientName} || '%'

SELECT CLIENTCODE, CLIENTNAME, SALESNUMBER, MANAGER, TELEPHONE, FAXNUMBER, MANAGEREMAIL, BUSINESS, PLACE, RELATE, BUSINESSTYPE, BANKNAME, ACCOUNTNUMBER, USESTATUS FROM CLIENT WHERE CLIENTNAME LIKE '%' || #{clientName} || '%' AND CLIENTCODE = #{clientCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CLIENT (CLIENTCODE, CLIENTNAME, SALESNUMBER, MANAGER, TELEPHONE, FAXNUMBER, MANAGEREMAIL, BUSINESS, PLACE, RELATE, BUSINESSTYPE, BANKNAME, ACCOUNTNUMBER, USESTATUS) VALUES ( #{clientCode}, #{clientName}, #{salesNumber}, #{manager}, #{telephone}, #{faxNumber}, #{managerEmail}, #{business}, #{place}, #{relate}, #{businessType}, #{bankName}, #{accountNumber}, #{useStatus} )
